h2. Macro Node

h3. Arguments

||name||description||
|id|id of node|| 
obliged param


h3. Available Parameters
||name||description|| 

|*$$active*|Whether node is active. eg:  True|
|*$$description*|Description of node|
|*$$gid*|Grid ID to which this node belongs. eg:  1|
|*$$guid*|GUID of node. eg:  1_1|
|*$$id*|ID of node. eg:  1|
|*$$ipaddr*|IP Address of node. eg:  10.0.3.139|
|*$$lastcheck*|Last time the node was checked.|
|*$$machineguid*|Machine GUID in which the node resides.|
|*$$name*|Name of machine on which node is running.|
|*$$netaddr*|Net Address of node |
|*$$peer_backup*||
|*$$peer_log*||
|*$$peer_stats*||
|*$$roles*|list of roles of node. eg:  node, computenode.kvm |
